#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#define fi for(i = 0; i < n; i++)
#define fj for(j = 0; j < n; j++)
int cmpfunc(const void *a, const void *b){
	return(*(int *)a - *(int *)b);
}

int main(){
	int t, n, i, j; scanf("%d", &t);
	while(t-- && scanf("%d", &n)){
		int a[n], b[n], c = 0;
		fi scanf("%d", &a[i]); fj scanf("%d", &b[j]);
		qsort(a, n, sizeof(int), cmpfunc), qsort(b, n, sizeof(int), cmpfunc);
		fi fj	if(b[j] >= a[i]){c++, b[j] = 0; break;}
		printf("%d\n", c);
	}
	return 0;
}
